meta.name: Chewie 豬兒
meta.about: Chewie was adopted in 2015 (2 yrs old). He's a canine distemper survivor and hopefully happier & healthier now! 2015 年被有心人在漁護處救回。豬兒是狗瘟生存者。希望未來過得開心健康！IG:@chewie_the_chewbarker

meta.name: Chewie the ChewBarker 豬兒
meta.about: Adopted by new pawrents in 2015 from @lap.org.hk. Canine distemper survivor 💪🏻. 🇭🇰 #HongKongDog but ✈️ to 🇸🇬 in 2022 so Singlish also can lah!
